name: WorldCup Fan Token PoW
description: WorldCup Fan Token ($WTF) is a newly launched cryptocurrency deployed on the EthereumPoW network. WTF is developing a web 3.0 betting App where users can bet on their favorite team via ETHW directly using a crypto wallet. And those funds will be in a smart contract, using Oracle will take the data and declare the winner. Blockchain technology will transfer winnings to the owner's account.
